metadata.name: car key
metadata.description:
[i]"Fast unlocking"[/i]
Adds a brand new trinket to the game!
While held, if Isaac collides with a locked object with a speed greater than his current maximum possible walking speed, it will be unlocked.
Locked objects include: chests, doors (excluding Mega Satan's Door) and lock blocks*.
* Due to API limitations, these will only be unlocked when you reenter the room.
This trinket will be part of the StrawPack 2 item pack. Stay tuned!
Art by Aczom and code by Strawrat.
